title: Google\Cloud\GkeHub\V1beta1\ResourceOptions
name: ResourceOptions
description:
ResourceOptions represent options for Kubernetes resource generation.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.gkehub.v1beta1.ResourceOptions

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.connect_version
params.description: Optional. The Connect agent version to use for connect_resources. Defaults to the latest GKE Connect version. The version must be a currently supported version, obsolete versions will be rejected.

params.name: data.v1beta1_crd
params.description: Optional. Use apiextensions/v1beta1 instead of apiextensions/v1 for CustomResourceDefinition resources. This option should be set for clusters with Kubernetes apiserver versions <1.16.

params.name: data.k8s_version
params.description: Optional. Major version of the Kubernetes cluster. This is only used to determine which version to use for the CustomResourceDefinition resources, apiextensions/v1beta1 orapiextensions/v1.
